meanings.definition: Resembling a wig in appearance or texture.
meanings.sent1: Her wiglike hairpiece was so realistic that no one could tell it wasn't her real hair.
meanings.sent2: The costume shop had a variety of wiglike hats for the play.
meanings.sent3: The wiglike mop on his head made him look like a mop himself!
meanings.sent4: The clouds in the sky had a wiglike appearance, fluffy and soft.
meanings.sent5: The wiglike fabric felt smooth and silky to the touch.
